body_html:
@andrhua, Thanks for your reply.
unfortunately build failed with bazel version 0.15.0 as well!
infact it failed much early. below is the build output

bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
Starting local Bazel server and connecting to it...
...........................................
WARNING: The following configs were expanded more than once: [cuda]. For repeatable flags, repeats are counted twice and may lead to unexpected behavior.
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: 'BAZEL_VC' is not set, start looking for the latest Visual C++ installed.
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: Looking for VS%VERSION%COMNTOOLS environment variables, eg. VS140COMNTOOLS
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: Visual C++ build tools found at C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: 'BAZEL_VC' is not set, start looking for the latest Visual C++ installed.
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: Looking for VS%VERSION%COMNTOOLS environment variables, eg. VS140COMNTOOLS
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: Visual C++ build tools found at C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: 'BAZEL_VC' is not set, start looking for the latest Visual C++ installed.
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: Looking for VS%VERSION%COMNTOOLS environment variables, eg. VS140COMNTOOLS
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: Visual C++ build tools found at C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\
ERROR: E:/git_projects/tensorflow-experimental/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:123:1: no such package '@libxsmm_archive//': C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/libxsmm_archive/documentation (Directory not empty) and referenced by '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:licenses'
ERROR: Analysis of target '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package' failed; build aborted: no such package '@libxsmm_archive//': C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/libxsmm_archive/documentation (Directory not empty)
INFO: Elapsed time: 784.562s
INFO: 0 processes.
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (74 packages loaded)
    currently loading: @protobuf_archive// ... (2 packages)

i tried msys as well.
it failed with same message as command prompt.

body:
@andrhua, Thanks for your reply.
unfortunately build failed with bazel version 0.15.0 as well!   
infact it failed much early. below is the build output


```
bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
Starting local Bazel server and connecting to it...
...........................................
WARNING: The following configs were expanded more than once: [cuda]. For repeatable flags, repeats are counted twice and may lead to unexpected behavior.
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: 'BAZEL_VC' is not set, start looking for the latest Visual C++ installed.
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: Looking for VS%VERSION%COMNTOOLS environment variables, eg. VS140COMNTOOLS
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: Visual C++ build tools found at C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: 'BAZEL_VC' is not set, start looking for the latest Visual C++ installed.
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: Looking for VS%VERSION%COMNTOOLS environment variables, eg. VS140COMNTOOLS
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: Visual C++ build tools found at C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: 'BAZEL_VC' is not set, start looking for the latest Visual C++ installed.
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:
Auto-Configuration Warning: Looking for VS%VERSION%COMNTOOLS environment variables, eg. VS140COMNTOOLS
DEBUG: C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/lib_cc_configure.bzl:115:5:

ERROR: E:/git_projects/tensorflow-experimental/tensorflow/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD:123:1: no such package '@libxsmm_archive//': C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/libxsmm_archive/documentation (Directory not empty) and referenced by '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:licenses'
ERROR: Analysis of target '//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package' failed; build aborted: no such package '@libxsmm_archive//': C:/users/user/_bazel_user/twu4fovw/external/libxsmm_archive/documentation (Directory not empty)
INFO: Elapsed time: 784.562s
INFO: 0 processes.
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (74 packages loaded)
    currently loading: @protobuf_archive// ... (2 packages) 
```

i tried msys as well.
it failed with same message as command prompt.
